20101207020155.333|20101207020158.667|CCO|BECAUSE IT STARTS WITH THE WHOLE
20101207020158.667|20101207020202.000|CCO|IDEA OF BEING AN ACTOR, WHEN IS

20101207020227.000|20101207020229.000|CCO|YOU BE SHY --

20101207020231.000|20101207020233.000|CCO|KINDS OF ACTORS, A MORE 
20101207020233.000|20101207020235.000|CCO|GREGARIOUS TYPE AND THE SHY

20101207020404.333|20101207020406.000|CCO|TRYING -- 
20101207020406.000|20101207020407.667|CCO|>> Larry: IN "MERCHANT OF 
20101207020407.667|20101207020409.333|CCO|VENICE."
20101207020409.333|20101207020411.000|CCO|HE PLAYED IT IN THE SUMMER

20101207020451.000|20101207020452.250|CCO|YOU'RE ACTING?

20101207020501.000|20101207020503.000|CCO|ANNOUNCEMENT COMES UP BY THE

20101207020511.000|20101207020512.250|CCO|THE AUDIENCES LOVE IT, THEY LOVE
20101207020512.250|20101207020513.500|CCO|IT WHEN THAT HAPPENS.
20101207020513.500|20101207020514.750|CCO|>> Larry: WHY?

20101207020522.667|20101207020524.333|CCO|AGAIN.
20101207020524.333|20101207020526.000|CCO|>> Larry: THE ADVANCE FOR 
20101207020526.000|20101207020527.667|CCO|"MERCHANT OF VENICE" WAS THE 
20101207020527.667|20101207020529.333|CCO|LARGEST.
20101207020529.333|20101207020531.000|CCO|IT WAS $4 MILLION.
20101207020531.000|20101207020533.500|CCO|YOU SHOULD BE VERY PROUD.
20101207020533.500|20101207020536.000|CCO|THE REVIEWS WERE AMAZING.
20101207020536.000|20101207020538.500|CCO|I WANT TO TOUCH A LOT OF BASES.
20101207020538.500|20101207020541.000|CCO|YOU PLAY SHILOC.
20101207020541.000|20101207020543.000|CCO|WAS SHAKES SPEER ANTI-SEMITIC --
20101207020543.000|20101207020545.000|CCO|>> IN MY OPINION NO, HE WASN'T.
20101207020545.000|20101207020547.000|CCO|THAT WAS 400 YEARS AGO.
20101207020547.000|20101207020549.000|CCO|THERE'S A LOT OF INTERPRETATIONS
20101207020549.000|20101207020551.000|CCO|OF THE PLAY.
20101207020551.000|20101207020554.333|CCO|TO ME, I THINK THERE'S 
20101207020554.333|20101207020557.667|CCO|ANTI-SEMITISM IN THE PLAY, OF 
20101207020557.667|20101207020601.000|CCO|COURSE, BUT I ALSO THINK SHILOC 
20101207020601.000|20101207020603.500|CCO|IBLATANT CRY AGAINST 
20101207020603.500|20101207020606.000|CCO|PREJUDICE IN SOME WAYS, WHEN YOU
20101207020606.000|20101207020608.500|CCO|THINK BEFORE WHAT THEY DO TO 
20101207020608.500|20101207020611.000|CCO|THIS PERSON BECAUSE HE'S A JEW.
20101207020611.000|20101207020612.667|CCO|HOW HE REACTS TO IT, AND WHAT 
20101207020612.667|20101207020614.333|CCO|HE'S BECOME.
20101207020614.333|20101207020616.000|CCO|WHAT HE'S MADE INTO.
20101207020616.000|20101207020617.667|CCO|>> DO YOU THINK ABOUT IT A LOT.
20101207020617.667|20101207020619.333|CCO|HOW I'M GOING TO -- HOW I VIEW 
20101207020619.333|20101207020621.000|CCO|HIM?
20101207020621.000|20101207020623.500|CCO|DO YOU HAVE TO LIKE HIM?
20101207020623.500|20101207020626.000|CCO|>> WELL, YEAH, I MEAN -- YOU 
20101207020626.000|20101207020628.500|CCO|KNOW, YOU DON'T -- YOU FIRST OF 
20101207020628.500|20101207020631.000|CCO|ALL, YOU THINK OF ANYBODY YOU'RE
20101207020631.000|20101207020632.429|CCO|PLAYING AS A HUMAN BEING, AND 
20101207020632.429|20101207020633.857|CCO|WHAT HIS NEEDS ARE, WHAT DRIVES 
20101207020633.857|20101207020635.286|CCO|HIM.
20101207020635.286|20101207020636.714|CCO|WHY HE IS WHERE HE IS AND WHAT 
20101207020636.714|20101207020638.143|CCO|HE'S DOING.
20101207020638.143|20101207020639.571|CCO|THESE ARE THE THINGS YOU FOCUS 
20101207020639.571|20101207020641.000|CCO|ON.
20101207020641.000|20101207020643.500|CCO|AND IN THAT POINT OF VIEW, YOU 
20101207020643.500|20101207020646.000|CCO|ARE -- AS FAR AS I'M CONCERNED, 
20101207020646.000|20101207020648.500|CCO|I'M LOOKING AT THE PLAY THROUGH 
20101207020648.500|20101207020651.000|CCO|SHILOC'S POINT OF VIEW, AND HE'S
20101207020651.000|20101207020652.429|CCO|DEFIANT.
20101207020652.429|20101207020653.857|CCO|HE'S DEFIANT IN THE FACE OF 
20101207020653.857|20101207020655.286|CCO|PREJUDICE.
20101207020655.286|20101207020656.714|CCO|HE DEFIES IT.
20101207020656.714|20101207020658.143|CCO|THAT'S WHAT I LOVE ABOUT THE 
20101207020658.143|20101207020659.571|CCO|CHARACTER.
20101207020659.571|20101207020701.000|CCO|YOU.
20101207020701.000|20101207020704.333|CCO|>> LIKE PLAYING SHAKESPEER?
20101207020704.333|20101207020707.667|CCO|>> I LOVE PLAYING SHAKESPEARE, I
20101207020707.667|20101207020711.000|CCO|DO.
20101207020711.000|20101207020712.667|CCO|>> Larry: I SAW ANOTHER PLAY -- 
20101207020712.667|20101207020714.333|CCO|WHEN IS THAT GOING TO COME OUT?
20101207020714.333|20101207020716.000|CCO|>> THIS HAS BEEN AN ONGOING 
20101207020716.000|20101207020717.667|CCO|THING FOR ME FOR FOUR YEARS.
20101207020717.667|20101207020719.333|CCO|IT ISN'T RARE FOR DOCUMENTARIES 
20101207020719.333|20101207020721.000|CCO|TO GO ON FOR A LONG TIME.
20101207020721.000|20101207020722.250|CCO|YOU WORK ON THEM, YOU DEVELOP 
20101207020722.250|20101207020723.500|CCO|THEM.
20101207020723.500|20101207020724.750|CCO|THERE'S NO SCRIPT TO START WITH,
20101207020724.750|20101207020726.000|CCO|SO I HAD AN IDEA.
20101207020726.000|20101207020727.250|CCO|AS I DID WITH LOOKING FOR 
20101207020727.250|20101207020728.500|CCO|RICHARD.
20101207020728.500|20101207020729.750|CCO|THERE WAS AN IDEA I HAD.
20101207020729.750|20101207020731.000|CCO|AND THAT TOOK ME THREE OR FOUR 
20101207020731.000|20101207020732.250|CCO|YEARS TO DO.
20101207020732.250|20101207020733.500|CCO|YOU DO IT WHILE YOU'RE DOING 
20101207020733.500|20101207020734.750|CCO|OTHER THINGS AND IT GOES BACK 
20101207020734.750|20101207020736.000|CCO|AND FORTH.
